dict.acceptation: 一套外衣；西装，套装；诉讼；恳求；
适合于（某人）；尤指服装、颜色等相配；合身；适宜；

sent.orig: I plan to rent a small suit of room or a suit of apartment with one-room-hall.
sent.trans: 我想租一间小套房或是一房一厅的公寓。

sent.orig: Follow Suit-Play a card of the suit that has been led.
sent.trans: 跟张——打和引牌相同花色的牌张。

sent.orig: Our Company has offer stuff: Jean Material Underwear Socks Suit-dress Business Suit.
sent.trans: 圈介绍：我们公司提供：牛仔裤，布料，内衣裤，袜子，女装服饰，男装服饰，西装（工厂）。

sent.orig: Direct suit and derivative suIt'should be used in civil procedure for misrepresentation.
sent.trans: 股东对公司提起的民事诉讼的方式有直接诉讼和派生诉讼两种。

sent.orig: Stage properties: one business suit, one tie, three pieces of wigs and a suit of skirt.
sent.trans: 道具：一套西装、一条领带、三个假发、一套裙子。
